title: Mission over masthead: The case for radical collaboration
description: I’ve spent nearly two decades in and around newsrooms, and one thing has continued to become more challenging year over year: resource constraints. The landscape is brutal. Nearly 136 U.S. newsrooms have closed or merged in 2025 alone. Following the closure of USAID, roughly $150 million in annual support for journalism vanished overnight. If our...
